page.title: 19My Favourite Clothes.
page.content:
The clothes I like wearing best are my BMX top and BMX socks and black trousers. On my feet I wear BMX trainers. I got them from Barnsley. On the trainers is a black band. It says "BMX" on the band, and the rest is white.I wear these clothes on a Sunday when we go to the pub and if I am invited to a party. Sometimes I wear them for school. {(Leon, aged 9)}
My favourite clothes are my jeans and my pink T-shirt and my pink trainers with blue and white stripes on them. I also like wearing my spotted dress and my blue shoes.My Mum only lets me wear my red sandals on special occasions like weddings and Christenings. I have got a new jumper but it is too big for me so I cannot wear it yet. {(Kelly, aged 8)
